sentences: Mees istus lauda ja vaatas raamatut.
context: The word 'meestele' appears to be in the Estonian language. In Estonian, this is likely the allative case of the word 'mees', which means 'man'. The allative case in Estonian typically indicates motion towards or direction to something. So 'meestele' would mean 'to a man' or 'towards a man'. This form shows movement toward a male person.
